item.title: 美国软件公司 Freshworks 着眼于收购，拥有 8 亿美元现金，人工智能是重点
item.description: 美国软件公司 Freshworks 首席执行官丹尼斯-伍德赛德（Dennis Woodside）周二告诉路透社，该公司正在探索收购事宜，其中包括人工智能公司。【原文：U.S. software company Freshworks is exploring acquisitions, including AI firms, backed by more than $800 million in cash, as it aims to boost revenue in the coming years, CEO Dennis Woodside told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车电池业务 PowerCo 正加紧寻求外部融资
item.description: 大众汽车公司电池业务首席执行官表示，随着其陷入困境的德国母公司对投资的控制，该公司正在更密切地关注外部融资方案。【原文：Volkswagen's PowerCo is looking more closely at external financing options as its stricken German parent reins in investment, the CEO of the battery business said.】

item.title: 报告称，不透明的加密货币计划危及中非共和国的国有资产
item.description: 据周三发表的一份报告称，在中非共和国为大选做准备之际，该国采用了不透明的加密货币计划，这增加了国有资产被外国犯罪组织攫取的风险。【原文：Central African Republic has embraced opaque cryptocurrency schemes that raise the risk of state assets being captured by foreign criminal organizations, according to a report published on Wednesday as the country gears up for an election.】

item.title: 国际能源机构（IEA）称，全球煤炭需求今年创下历史新高，但到 2030 年将会下降。
item.description: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）周三表示，全球煤炭需求量在2025年创下历史新高，但预计到2030年将有所下降，因为可再生能源、核能和丰富的天然气将挤压煤炭在发电领域的主导地位。【原文：Global coal demand reached a record high in 2025 but is expected to decline by 2030 as renewables, nuclear power and abundant natural gas squeeze its dominance in power generation, the International Energy Agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟将加强对高排放进口商品的碳税征收，打击逃避碳税的企图
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会将于周三公布的提案草案，欧盟将扩大碳边境税（对进口高排放商品征收的费用）的征收范围，将汽车零部件和洗衣机也包括在内。【原文：The European Union will expand its carbon border levy - a fee charged on imports of high-emission goods - to cover car parts and washing machines, according to draft European Commission proposals due to be published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 隐私组织指控 TikTok 通过第三方跟踪器监控 Grindr 活动
item.description: 隐私权倡导组织 noyb 周三向奥地利数据保护机构提交了针对 TikTok、Grindr 和 AppsFlyer 的投诉，称这些公司违反了地区隐私法，有可能暴露敏感数据。【原文：A privacy advocacy group, noyb, filed complaints to Austria's data protection authority on Wednesday against TikTok, Grindr and AppsFlyer, alleging these companies breached regional privacy laws, risking exposure of sensitive data.】

item.title: 早间竞标：英国通胀是英国央行裁决前的最后一关
item.description: Rae Wee 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 正与亚马逊洽谈至少 100 亿美元的融资事宜，并将使用其人工智能芯片
item.description: 人工智能公司 OpenAI 正在洽谈从亚马逊融资 100 亿美元或更多，并使用其人工智能芯片。【原文：Artificial intelligence firm OpenAI is in talks to raise $10 billion or more from Amazon and use its AI chips, the Information reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 竞争对手纷纷涌入，Robinhood 扩大体育赛事合约
item.description: Robinhood 将允许客户对职业足球运动员的个人表现下注，这是该在线经纪公司周二推出的一批新的体育赛事合同的一部分。【原文：Robinhood will allow customers to wager on the individual performances of professional football players as part of a new batch of sports-focused event contracts the online brokerage rolled out on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片制造商 MetaX 首次上市股价大涨近 600
item.description: 周三，MetaX Integrated Circuits 的股价在上海首日大涨近 600%，原因是中国加快了本土人工智能芯片制造商的上市步伐，以减少对美国巨头英伟达（Nvidia）和先进微器件（Advanced Micro Devices）的依赖。【原文：MetaX Integrated Circuits shares jumped nearly 600% in their Shanghai debut on Wednesday, as China speeds up flotation by homegrown AI chipmakers to reduce reliance on U.S. majors Nvidia and Advanced Micro Devices .】

item.title: 劳动力数据导致加息路径不确定，美元接近 2 个半月低点
item.description: 美元周三持稳，接近10月初以来的最低点，此前的数据显示劳动力市场依然疲软，令投资者对美联储下一次降息的时间感到不安。【原文：The U.S. dollar was steady on Wednesday and near its lowest since the start of October after data showed the labour market remained soft, leaving investors on edge about when the next rate cut from the Federal Reserve is likely to come.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 HashKey 首次在香港稳健交易
item.description: 加密货币交易所 HashKey Holdings 首次公开募股募集了 2.06 亿美元，其股价周三在香港市场首次亮相就攀升了 6.6%。【原文：Shares of crypto exchange HashKey Holdings climbed 6.6% in their Hong Kong market debut on Wednesday after an initial public offering that raised $206 million.】

item.title: 美国就业数据公布后股市犹豫不决，石油因委内瑞拉封锁而跳涨
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市犹豫不决，因为好坏参半的美国就业数据未能对美国的利率前景产生影响，投资者正在等待进一步的线索来指引他们的下一步行动。【原文：Asia shares were hesitant on Wednesday after a mixed U.S. jobs reading failed to move the needle on the rate outlook there, leaving investors awaiting further cues to guide their next move.】

item.title: 据 ET 报道，苹果公司正在与印度芯片制造商洽谈 iPhone 部件的组装和封装事宜
item.description: 据当地报纸《经济时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正在与印度一些芯片制造商就 iPhone 部件的组装和封装进行初步谈判。【原文：Apple is in preliminary talks with some Indian chip manufacturers for the assembly and packaging of iPhone component, local newspaper Economic Times reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Blackstone 主导对数据安全公司 Cyera 的投资，估值 90 亿美元
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，Blackstone 正牵头对 Cyera 投资 4 亿美元，对这家以色列数据安全初创公司的估值为 90 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone is leading a $400 million investment in Cyera that values the Israeli data-security startup at $9 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普计划对逾期、超预算的国防承包商实施财务限制
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，特朗普政府正计划出台一项行政命令，限制那些预算超支和工期延误的国防承包商的分红、回购和高管薪酬。【原文：The Trump administration is planning an executive order that would limit dividends, buybacks and executive pay for defense contractors that are over-budget and delayed, according to three sources briefed on the order.】

item.title: 特朗普下令封锁进出委内瑞拉的受制裁油轮，石油上涨 1.5
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令 "全面彻底 "封锁所有进出委内瑞拉的受制裁油轮，美国原油期货周三上涨超过1%。【原文：U.S. crude futures rose more than 1% on Wednesday as U.S. President Donald Trump ordered "a total and complete" blockade of all sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.】

item.title: 日本出口连续第三个月增长，美国发货量反弹
item.description: 日本政府周三公布的数据显示，11月份日本出口连续第三个月增长，对美国的出口八个月来首次反弹，这为日本央行继续加息提供了支持。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a third straight month in November, government data showed on Wednesday, as shipments to the U.S. rebounded for the first time in eight months, bolstering the case for the central bank to continue raising interest rates.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局局长称尚未完成出售其在共和航空公司的股份
item.description: 根据周二公开的一封信，美国联邦航空管理局局长表示，他没有剥离其在共和航空公司的股份，但他将继续回避可能影响该航空公司财务的问题。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said he had not divested his shares in Republic Airways but he would continue to recuse himself from issues that could impact the airline's finances, according to a letter made public on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加州监管机构暂时允许特斯拉继续在该州销售汽车
item.description: 加州监管机构允许特斯拉暂时继续在该州销售汽车，这是该电动汽车制造商被指控虚假营销和夸大自动驾驶功能一案的最新进展。【原文：A California regulator has allowed Tesla to continue selling vehicles in the state for now, the latest development in a case in which the electric vehicle maker had been accused of falsely marketing and overstating self-driving capabilities.】

item.title: 特朗普下令 "封锁 "进出委内瑞拉的受制裁油轮
item.description: 目前还不清楚特朗普将如何对被制裁的船只采取这一行动，也不清楚他是否会像上周那样求助于海岸警卫队来拦截船只。【原文：It is unclear how Trump will impose the move against the sanctioned vessels, and whether he will turn to the Coast Guard to interdict vessels like he did last week.】

item.title: 据 Punchbowl 报道，白宫正在准备可能限制军事承包商报酬的命令
item.description: 据 Punchbowl News 周二报道，白宫正在准备一项行政命令，可能会限制军事承包商的股票回购、分红和高管薪酬。【原文：The White House is preparing an executive order that could limit stock buybacks, dividends and executive compensation for military contractors, Punchbowl News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司任命小布鲁斯-马蒂森为新任首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周三任命小布鲁斯-马蒂森（Bruce Mathieson Jr）为新任首席执行官，他将放弃董事长职位。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment on Wednesday named Bruce Mathieson Jr as its new chief executive as he relinquishes his position as the chairman.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，一些特朗普官员对哈塞特出任美联储主席表示怀疑
item.description: Politico 周二援引三位熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道称，一些特朗普政府官员私下对可能选择国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）担任下一任美联储主席表示怀疑。【原文：Some Trump administration officials have privately raised doubts about the possible selection of National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett as the next Federal Reserve chair, Politico reported on Tuesday, citing three people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 日本女子与梦想中的虚拟伴侣举行婚礼，绽放人工智能浪漫之花
item.description: 在日本西部的一个婚礼大厅里，音乐响起，身着白色礼服、头戴皇冠的野口百合奈一边擦拭眼泪，一边聆听准丈夫的话语：一个从智能手机屏幕中凝视出来的人工智能角色。【原文：Music played in a wedding hall in western Japan as Yurina Noguchi, wearing a white gown and tiara, dabbed away her tears, taking in the words of her husband-to-be: an AI-generated persona gazing out from a smartphone screen.】

item.title: 美国众议院小组将就停机期间支付空中交通管制员工资的问题进行表决
item.description: 美国众议院的一个委员会计划于周四就旨在通过确保空中交通管制员和其他主要工作人员的工资来防止政府关门期间航空中断的立法进行投票。【原文：A U.S. House of Representatives committee on Thursday plans to vote on legislation aiming to prevent aviation disruptions during government shutdowns by ensuring air traffic controllers and other key workers are paid.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，Waymo 讨论以超过 1000 亿美元的估值融资数十亿美元
item.description: 据《信息报》周二援引熟悉这家打车服务提供商计划的人士的话报道，Alphabet 旗下公司 Waymo 正在与潜在投资者谈判，希望以至少 1000 亿美元的估值进行融资。【原文：Alphabet unit Waymo is in talks with potential investors to raise money at a valuation of at least $100 billion, the Information reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the ride-hailing service provider's plans.】

item.title: 港口主管称，由于关税影响，美国最繁忙海港 11 月份进口量下降 11.5
item.description: 洛杉矶港执行董事吉恩-塞罗卡（Gene Seroka）周二表示，在托运人提前建立库存以避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对玩具、汽车零部件和金属家具等商品征收关税之后，美国最繁忙的海港 11 月份的进口吞吐量比去年同期减少了 11.5%。【原文：The nation's busiest seaport handled 11.5% less import volume in November than in the year-ago month after shippers built early inventories to avoid President Donald Trump's tariffs on goods such as toys, auto parts and metal furniture, Gene Seroka, executive director of the Port of Los Angeles, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 购房需求下降，伦纳季度利润疲软
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商莱纳（Lennar）周二公布的第四季度利润不及华尔街预期，原因是经济承受能力压力继续拖累购房需求，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 4%。【原文：U.S. homebuilder Lennar missed Wall Street's estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, as affordability pressures continued to weigh on homebuying demand, sending the company's shares down more than 4% in after-hours trading.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，精神航空和边疆航空有意合并
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，破产的精神航空控股公司（Spirit Aviation Holdings）正在与前沿集团控股公司（Frontier Group Holdings）商讨合并事宜。【原文：Bankrupt Spirit Aviation Holdings is in discussions to merge with Frontier Group Holdings , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
